alert.note: Alert for Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 23 at 7:38PM CDT until June 23 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN SCOTTS BLUFF...SOUTHWESTERN SIOUX AND EAST CENTRAL GOSHEN COUNTIES... At 638 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lyman, or 13 miles southeast of Torrington, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Torrington, Morrill, Lyman, Yoder, Huntley, Stegall, Veteran and Henry. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska...and southeastern Wyoming. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
